materials: Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Used Motor Oil; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Most AutoZone stores accept used motor oil, transmission fluid, gear oil and automotive batteries. Call to see what your local store is currently accepting.
